entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
